member.name: T:JocysCom.VS.AiCompanion.Plugins.Core.Basic
member.summary: Helps AI to auto-continue on the task.

member.name: M:JocysCom.VS.AiCompanion.Plugins.Core.Basic.AutoContinue(System.String)
member.summary: Use when you can't provide an answer in one response and need to split the answer. Use after reply when user asks to generate answers with permission to continue. Continue with the next part of the reply after this function call return "Please continue".
member.returns: Automatic reply from the user.
member.param: Reserved. Send empty string as a value.
member.exception: Error message explaining why execution failed.

member.name: M:JocysCom.VS.AiCompanion.Plugins.Core.Basic.GetWebPageContents(System.String)
member.summary: Retrieve content of websites by URL.
member.param: URL which points to the resource.
member.returns: The output of the request.
member.exception: Error message explaining why the request failed.

member.name: M:JocysCom.VS.AiCompanion.Plugins.Core.Basic.StartProcess(System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Execute a process on user computer. Use `System.Diagnostics.ProcessStartInfo`
member.param: Application or document to start.
Command-line arguments to use when starting the application.
The working directory for the process to be started. Default is empty string.
member.returns: The output of the started process.
member.exception: Error message explaining why the request failed.
member.remarks: Be cautious with executing process requesys received via API due to security risks.

member.name: M:JocysCom.VS.AiCompanion.Plugins.Core.Basic.RunPowerShellScript(System.String)
member.summary: Execute a PowerShell script on user computer.
member.param: The PowerShell script to be executed.
member.returns: The output of the executed PowerShell script.
member.exception: Error message explaining why the request failed.
member.remarks: Be cautious with executing scripts received via API due to security risks.

The string to write to the file.
member.returns: True if the operation was successful.

member.name: M:JocysCom.VS.AiCompanion.Plugins.Core.Basic.CompareFilesAndReturnChanges(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Compares two files and returns a textual representation of the changes.
member.param: The path to the original file.
The path to the modified file.
member.returns: A string detailing the changes made from the original file to the modified file.

member.name: M:JocysCom.VS.AiCompanion.Plugins.Core.Basic.ApplyFileChanges(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Updates content of the current document by applying a series of changes in the unified diff format as recognized by the diff-match-patch library. This format is focused on efficient text manipulation, supporting insertions, deletions, and modifications, especially useful when bandwidth or storage is limited.
member.param: The path to the file that needs to be updated.
The string representation of the changes to apply, adhering to the diff format specified above.
member.returns: 'OK' if the operation was successful; otherwise, an error message.

member.name: T:JocysCom.VS.AiCompanion.Plugins.Core.ListItem
member.summary: Represents a versatile list item used in various contexts such as TODO lists, environment variable management, and diverse list compilations. Structured as a key-value pair with an optional comment, facilitating a broad spectrum of applications from settings configuration to task management. Aides in organizing data in a simple, yet effective manner, offering hints for creative AI utilization beyond predefined uses.

member.name: P:JocysCom.VS.AiCompanion.Plugins.Core.ListItem.Key
member.summary: The unique identifier or name for the list item.

member.name: P:JocysCom.VS.AiCompanion.Plugins.Core.ListItem.Value
member.summary: The value associated with the key.

member.name: P:JocysCom.VS.AiCompanion.Plugins.Core.ListItem.Comment
member.summary: Optional. Provides additional information about the list item, such as task status (e.g., complete, pending) or extra details for settings and environment variables. It encourages to infer potential statuses or metadata that could enhance data handling or task management strategies creatively.

member.name: F:JocysCom.VS.AiCompanion.Plugins.Core.RiskLevel.Medium
member.summary: Medium. AI can read and write or set data.

member.name: F:JocysCom.VS.AiCompanion.Plugins.Core.RiskLevel.High
member.summary: High. AI can read, write and run scripts.

member.returns: True if the operation was successful.

member.name: M:JocysCom.VS.AiCompanion.Plugins.Core.VsFunctions.ISolutionHelper.ApplyCurrentDocumentContentsChanges(System.String)
member.summary: Updates content of the current document by applying a series of changes in the unified diff format as recognized by the diff-match-patch library. This format is focused on efficient text manipulation, supporting insertions, deletions, and modifications, especially useful when bandwidth or storage is limited.
member.param: The string representation of the changes to apply, adhering to the diff format specified above.
member.returns: 'OK' if the operation was successful; otherwise, an error message.

member.name: M:JocysCom.VS.AiCompanion.Plugins.Core.VsFunctions.ISolutionHelper.SetCurrentDocumentContents(System.String)
member.summary: Sets the content of the currently open and active Document in the editor.
member.param: The Document to be made active.
member.returns: True if the operation was successful.

member.name: M:JocysCom.VS.AiCompanion.Plugins.Core.VsFunctions.ISolutionHelper.GetSelection
member.summary: Retrieves the selection information and data from the current active open Document.

member.name: M:JocysCom.VS.AiCompanion.Plugins.Core.VsFunctions.ISolutionHelper.SetSelection(System.String)
member.summary: Sets the selection within the active Document based on the provided data.
member.param: The selection data to be applied to the active Document.
member.returns: True if the operation was successful.

member.name: M:JocysCom.VS.AiCompanion.Plugins.Core.VsFunctions.ISolutionHelper.ApplySelectionChanges(System.String)
member.summary: Updates selection of the current document by applying a series of changes in the unified diff format as recognized by the diff-match-patch library. This format is focused on efficient text manipulation, supporting insertions, deletions, and modifications, especially useful when bandwidth or storage is limited.
member.param: The string representation of the changes to apply, adhering to the diff format specified above.
member.returns: 'OK' if the operation was successful; otherwise, an error message.

member.name: M:JocysCom.VS.AiCompanion.Plugins.Core.VsFunctions.ISolutionHelper.GetErrors(System.Nullable{JocysCom.VS.AiCompanion.Plugins.Core.VsFunctions.ErrorLevel},System.String,System.String,System.Boolean,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Retrieves a list of errors. Results can by filtered.
member.param: The error level to filter by. If null, all error levels are considered.
The specific project to filter errors by. If null, errors from all projects are considered.
The specific file name to filter errors by. If null, errors from all files are considered.
If true, includes the document item associated with each error.
If true, additionally loads the contents of the document item associated with each error. This parameter is effective only if is also true.
member.returns: A list of objects representing the filtered errors.

member.name: M:JocysCom.VS.AiCompanion.Plugins.Core.VsFunctions.ISolutionHelper.GetSelectedErrors(System.Boolean,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Retrieves errors currently selected in the Error List Window.
member.param: Includes the Document associated with the errors.
Includes Document file contents.

member.name: M:JocysCom.VS.AiCompanion.Plugins.Core.VsFunctions.ISolutionHelper.GetCurrentException(System.Boolean,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Retrieves information about the currently caught exception, if any.
member.param: Includes the Document associated with the Exception.
Includes Document file contents.

member.summary: Formats the entire content of the currently active Document according to the solution's code style settings.
member.returns: True if the operation was successful.

member.name: M:JocysCom.VS.AiCompanion.Plugins.Core.VsFunctions.ISolutionHelper.EditFormatSelection
member.summary: Formats the currently selected code fragment in the active Document according to the solution's code style settings.
member.returns: True if the operation was successful.
